title: NERF FUCKING ZAC
body:
NERF THIS FUCKING CANCER AND HIS FUCKING SLINGSHOT
PIECE OF CANCER CHAMPION

FUCK U BALANCE TEAM FUCK U

replies.body: Let it out my friend. Do not let your anger poison you.
how to get what you want 101
When a post contains the word "cancer" and is all written using Caps Lock that post can be ignored.
This is why level 20 players shouldn't be allowed to post on forums :)
you can delete this now and breath a little maybe

> [{quoted}](name=HarbingerN7,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EyOaznQM,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-07T20:52:05.527+0000)

> FUCK U BALANCE TEAM FUCK U

amen.

I think you are right, zac needs to be nerfed. 

But i cannot agree with the way you have expressed your opinions.
